readable.title: 3459156091_c1879ebe28
readable.content: a boy is kneeling under a statue of bear that has a painting of a man on its back . A boy sits under a bear with Einstein 's picture on it . A picture of Albert Einstein on a white bear statue , with a little boy standing under the bear statue 's face . A portrait of Einstein is painted on statue of a polar bear . Painting of Albert Einstein on a bear with child reaching up .
